recipesJson.name: Jack and Tan
recipesJson.author: Gordo
recipesJson.description: Tropical and refreshing, ... like a cold brewski on a summer night......

reviews.text: I love sweet tangerine, I just hate how the sweetness of it is so prominent.  You solved that with the earthiness of jackfruit.  All the other accent flavors are subtle but effective.  This is a mighty fine mix.
